text: Ani jo koni allahacya margata hijarata (desa-tyaga) karila, tara tyala dharativara nivasakarita khupa vistrta jaga milela ani khupa samrd'dhihi. Ani jo apalya gharapasuna allaha ani tyacya paigambarakade hijarata karila, maga tyala mrtyune ye'una gathave, taridekhila tyaca mobadala allahajavala niscita ahe ani allaha motha mapha karanara, dayavana ahe
